thread.title: Jessica Biel's baby weight loss secrets: Paleo diet, yoga and CrossFit workouts
thread.title_full: Jessica Biel's baby weight loss secrets: Paleo diet, yoga and CrossFit workouts | Examiner.com

author: Samantha Chang
title: Jessica Biel's baby weight loss secrets: Paleo diet, yoga and CrossFit workouts
text:
Play Jessica Biel discusses diet and exercise. aol.com Jessica Biel showed off her impressive post-baby weight loss at the 2015 Night Of Stars Gala hosted by the Fashion Group International in New York Oct. 22. Biel was accompanied by husband Justin Timberlake to the event, which honored rising fashion stars.
Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images Jessica looked elegant in a form-fitting tea pencil dress that accentuated her slim physique. Biel's weight loss secret is an organic Paleo-inspired diet, she said on Twitter.
Biel credited Paleta, a farm-to-table meal delivery service, for her rapid weight loss after giving birth to son Silas in April 2015. "Thank you ‪@eatpaleta for making my life easy & delicious," Biel tweeted . "3 meals & snacks at my doorstep? Yes pls."
Biel maintains her toned bikini body with CrossFit workouts, yoga, sprints and weightlifting. The athletic Jessica has always been outdoorsy and enthusiastic about fitness.
For cardio exercise, Biel usually jogs for a half-mile and then does sprint intervals of 100-meter, 200-meter and 400-meter sprints. Jessica also lifts weights (using light weights at high repetitions) to keep her muscles lean.
"I’ve always been physical," said Biel, 33. "I have no concept of what life is like without physical activity."
Jessica embraces an organic Paleo-style diet that limits processed foods. “Fermented veggies and probiotics are also great for my skin and digestion," said Biel. "You can also buy shredded fermented vegetables at a health-food store and sprinkle them over a salad or even eggs in the morning."
Other celebrities who follow the Paleo diet and do CrossFit include Jessica Alba, Kellan Lutz and Joe Manganiello, Celebrity Health & Fitness reported. Similarly, singer Tim McGraw lost 40 pounds and got rippling 8-pack abs with a low-carb Paleo diet and CrossFit workouts.
Biel doesn't believe in starvation diets, and says portion control is her No. 1 weight loss secret. "Eat things you like, but in smaller portions," said Jessica. "I always cut things in half and send half back. Do I eat dessert? If there's something I want to try, then I try it. But I have a bite, not the whole thing."
